Question: Dongguan HC Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan HC Technology Co., Ltd

Product: Portable Bluetooth Trolley Speaker

- Family portable audio outdoor multimedia party speakers
- Dual 6inch, dual 8inch
- Plastic cabinet with IPAD slot
- Side foot pads and hand holder
- Waterproof speakers
- 200W home audio
- Available at CES 2024 booth 53471
